ygData.subject: Adding Seeds Programmatically
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I am writing a Twitter Extractor for heritrix 1.14.4 (run from Netarchive Suite)  which is intended to add as seeds urls discovered via the Twitter API.

Subject: Adding Seeds Programmatically

Hi,
I am writing a Twitter Extractor for heritrix 1.14.4 (run from Netarchi=
ve Suite)  which is intended to add as seeds urls discovered via the Twitte=
r API. Here is a code fragment from the extractor:

CandidateURI curi =3D C=
andidateURI.createSeedCandidateURI(UURIFactory.getInstance(tweetUrl));
    =
                              getController().getScope().addSeed(curi); 

T=
he newly added seeds are logged:
  
# Heritrix added seed (JMX) 20120813090=
605826.
http://www.twitter.com/giovannydur18/status/234938574540251137

But=
 they all fail in seeds report:
-1 NOTCRAWLED http://www.twitter.com/giovan=
nydur18/status/234938574540251137

and are shown in the GUI as "Heritrix(-1=
)-Domain unresolvable". 

I've tried experimentally reusing one of these di=
scovered seeds in the initial seedlist and it works fine. Any ideas? Could =
it be some strange dns issue?

Colin Rosenthal
State and University Library=

Aarhus, Denmark
